install.name: EasyBlog integration for AcyMailing
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2018 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
install.description: This AcyMailing plugin enables you to include easyblog articles in AcyMailing

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: customtemplate
param.label: Custom template
param.description: Click on the Custom template button to create a custom layout that will override the default view

param.name: displayart
param.label: Display articles
param.description: Select if you want to display all articles in the popup for article selection or only published articles

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid
param.description: Specify the menu ID attached to EasyBlog, this Itemid will be added to your links

param.name: contentaccess
param.label: Content Access
param.description: If you use the automatic article insertion (via the categories tab), AcyMailing will only include articles having the selected access in your Newsletter

param.name: blockedcat
param.label: Blocked categories
param.description: AcyMailing will not display articles belonging to these categories. You should enter each category ID separated by a comma.

param.name: frontendaccess
param.label: Front-end Access
param.description: You can restrict the access to this tag system on the Front-end
param.option: Don't display this tag system on the front-end
